item.title: 以色列国防部长宣布对伊朗现场罢工时，在德黑兰听到的爆炸声
item.description: 在德黑兰听到的爆炸 - ＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmihafbvv95cuxnzvc0zki4egrqzy1reeg2b2b0b0pod0qznvpfqm1adzv1r3hpvggtixiqutdn0xfs vlln1nranhycetqnfl3tfdonvzpu1j6nw8teervmmdgoxmxrrrnwkphkhkn5q3navxfkshhrzgi3exf4dl8yrgdfmvdfmvdgdgws1hctlrnwdbc2c1ofg？ target =“ _ blank”>实时更新：在德黑兰报道的以色列罢工伊朗＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn 以色列在其核计划上罢工＆nbsp; nbsp; wsj 以色列罢工目标伊朗的核计划：实时更新＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiekfvx3lxte9nuekykyelptttzbxv3dkdkdw5ismu0mw9nzk4tquh0q1fn02cvy02cvy0s 0m4zfjicwnkdjjeyvbmvy01oxhms3ftoxljzllsvjhlwk83ynjlzlj3uu5quhbsqkfhnmfktlexbggdbefjru3pgjru3pgtextgtxtgtxtgxtgxtgftxtgfwqy1naml3？oc = 5？ target =“ _ blank”>美国。告诉以色列，它不会参加以色列对伊朗的罢工＆nbsp; nbsp; axios

item.title: “我不知道我还活着，”印度撞车幸存者告诉家人 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: ‘我不知道我还活着，’空气印度崩溃幸存者告诉家人＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmigwfbvv95cuxochrdwvz4wkjvznf1n1v0szvvzvz3a0ovk0ovk0odfk0odfk0odfodkhqccccccccccccccccw1vrbnreztffz swrnsdk3qwpvmm45wm9duum2exjsagley0vxejnkzmjseuj1qw9yadlsu0nbzjm0q2peqvh3yvruwruwmzjnvpznvpzcg1zwflxt1zwflxt1ryt1ryt3d2mmht1ryt1ryt3d2mh3r0jfna？ target =“ _ blank”>印度火气坠毁杀死了241人，离开了1个幸存者。 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmifkfvx3lxte5ltxezvldsnepoztnxakhdbdnhvm5irc15tw9kykjur3jgbmm4oevw bTYwT2lZd3ZkZ1hJbWlsWE5TRTgzeFp3N25waTB6TVdJY3BEN19Yb2tObjR3enpBRm9EcGNjUnYybllHOEJQck93VGNQMTZVNUFiY2RlZw?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>致命的印度飞机失事：照片和视频＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 纽约时报 ＆nbsp;＆nbsp; yahoo 印度空气崩溃：一对医生夫妇及其三个孩子在新生活章节之前单击自拍照。然后，悲剧发生了

item.title: 加沙援助集团说，8名当地工人丧生，21人受伤 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 加沙援助小组说，有8名当地工人丧生，21名受伤＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmihafbvv95cuxpanbztgjzbgzbgzyr2xzuji0cenaq1jntlpqwuxctctctfr6btddurdtlldtlldtlllcuje4b ELFQXBWYJM5YZRNX3L6M2SXS3G4AZIXVNRUEFV6WM1XU3BKEG9TVZBABBAQMXNSDZHRDQTLDQXTLLFSFSFSFZKEERINJLSDE5IC3LFSGLVSGLVAZBTUXBTUXBTUXL2TWHOAA？ target =“ _ blank”>加沙援助小组说，哈马斯袭击了其巴勒斯坦工人＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMisgFBVV95cUxPZHJyenFQU1JtamZqbFY2bnZiOUtZZFVTSnd4QmgwSEVyMEo5VzV3aUhPRHVaVFgwZTB6c0RVTm52 lxjhnhvwt2dhovdfaghxnzl1tuq0x0h6sknonvvfdmdbznj5uta1vxq1z2lnmul6ytr5 DS1UTFV3S3K1QLRMB0ZZQ0VLDMLZSUWZZMZCACACCA2NNVVDZC1FZSVNXNFP6QMZHLXD0BEP5 eDNHT1RlZ2pHdXJn0gG3AUFVX3lxTE40V3lnYUVad2cyT2V0a3kwbjhUTG1VdnhXRTN2UGlpeWRxeWcyVWZHaE5PSEkzOUVhQzEzVjFXSFo1NnZHdHhsOHlVRF8zUUtpZk5NUEwy cUVWbHdrSGRCenE2SHpKeVZfSXFmWm8xYzVndHozdFhhV2FpU2gxRHlVNFFWVE9KVnU0RWJzWF85ajdfc2xtXzB4VWVYNEtaeTlxUm1XVnFpX1hURzZ1cV9RbTFEaVo5SQ?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>哈马斯警方说，它杀死了加沙以色列支持的阿布·沙巴布民兵的12名成员href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmivwfbvv95cuxpr21mznnmnfh6eufkch hjckdzukjukjobmfvovlfahbkr1a3dv9px2lmdtzzbk02dtbwzgdhyhyhaha0xy0xanf0xaNf0txzlqmlrq09k su444ugtztzvsz1i1dvpfx2u2a2lquxdluwfgse5vu0vu0swtteznfbxwjztzhjmdmyzyvh5ml9zcna3bf J3OFPKWFC2UWV3SJQ0Z2NLADLNLVPBVJHEU29ZMV96ZZZFPS3FIZE1JN3Y2T1ZJTJTJTJTJTJTJHNQ96UQ？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>在加沙伏击中丧生的人道主义工人指责哈马斯；互联网在领土上切割＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 路透社 GAZA食品点附近的更多大规模伤亡人士说，五名员工被杀＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者
